actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide assistance for workforce investment activities to unique populations in Alaska and Hawaii.
short_title: Workforce Investment for Unique Populations in Hawaii and Alaska Act of 2011

summary.text: Workforce Investment for Unique Populations in Hawaii and Alaska Act of 2011 - Authorizes the Secretary of Labor to provide assistance to the Cook Inlet Tribal Council, Incorporated, Alaska, and the University of Hawaii Maui College, Hawaii, to improve job training and other workforce investment activities for the unique populations who reside in Alaska and Hawaii.

titles.title: Workforce Investment for Unique Populations in Hawaii and Alaska Act of 2011
A bill to provide assistance for workforce investment activities to unique populations in Alaska and Hawaii.
